verses.text: \w In|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3060"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7651"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Jehu Joas began \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H8141"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* forty \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* Jerusalem. \w The|strong="H3060"\w* name \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3060"\w* mother \w was|strong="H1121"\w* Sebia \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Bersabee.

\w And|strong="H3389"\w* Joas did \w that|strong="H8141"\w* which \w was|strong="H8034"\w* right before \w the|strong="H8034"\w* Lord all \w the|strong="H8034"\w* \w days|strong="H8141"\w* \w that|strong="H8141"\w* Joiada \w the|strong="H8034"\w* priest taught \w him|strong="H3389"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3117"\w* \w yet|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* took not \w away|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* high \w places|strong="H3605"\w*: \w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H0834"\w* still sacrificed \w and|strong="H3068"\w* burnt incense \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* high \w places|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w And|strong="H2076"\w* Joas said \w to|strong="H6999"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* \w priests|strong="H3808"\w*: O \w All|strong="H5750"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* money \w of|strong="H1116"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* sanctified \w things|strong="H3808"\w*, which \w is|strong="H3808"\w* brought \w into|strong="H5493"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* temple \w of|strong="H1116"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* Lord \w by|strong="H3808"\w* those \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w pass|strong="H5493"\w*, which \w is|strong="H3808"\w* \w offered|strong="H6999"\w* \w for|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* price \w of|strong="H1116"\w* \w a|strong="H2076"\w* soul, \w and|strong="H2076"\w* which \w of|strong="H1116"\w* \w their|strong="H3808"\w* own accord, \w and|strong="H2076"\w* \w of|strong="H1116"\w* \w their|strong="H3808"\w* own free heart \w they|strong="H3808"\w* bring \w into|strong="H5493"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* temple \w of|strong="H1116"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* Lord:

\w Let|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w take|strong="H0935"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w according|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w order|strong="H0559"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* repair \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, wheresoever \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w see|strong="H0935"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w thing|strong="H6944"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* wanteth repairing.

Now till \w the|strong="H3605"\w* three \w and|strong="H1004"\w* twentieth year \w of|strong="H1004"\w* king Joas, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w did|strong="H0834"\w* not \w make|strong="H2388"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w repairs|strong="H2388"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w temple|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* Joas called Joiada \w the|strong="H0853"\w* high \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, saying \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*: \w Why|strong="H3808"\w* do \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w repair|strong="H2388"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w temple|strong="H1004"\w*? \w Take|strong="H2388"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w therefore|strong="H1961"\w* money \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H3808"\w* according \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* order, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* restore \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w for|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w repairing|strong="H2388"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w temple|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w were|strong="H0369"\w* forbidden \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w any|strong="H0369"\w* \w more|strong="H0369"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w people|strong="H0408"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w repairs|strong="H2388"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1004"\w* Joiada \w the|strong="H0853"\w* high \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* chest \w and|strong="H1004"\w* bored \w a|strong="H3947"\w* hole \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* top, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* set \w it|strong="H3947"\w* \w by|strong="H3701"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* altar \w at|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* right hand \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w that|strong="H1115"\w* came \w into|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w that|strong="H1115"\w* kept \w the|strong="H0853"\w* doors \w put|strong="H3947"\w* therein all \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* \w that|strong="H1115"\w* \w was|strong="H1004"\w* \w brought|strong="H3947"\w* \w to|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w temple|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w when|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H8033"\w* saw \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* very \w much|strong="H3605"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w chest|strong="H0727"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* king’s scribe \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* high \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w up|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* poured \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w out|strong="H3605"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* counted \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* found \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*:

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w gave|strong="H1961"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w out|strong="H7200"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w number|strong="H4487"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* measure \w into|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* hands \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w over|strong="H0853"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* builders \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* laid \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w out|strong="H7200"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* carpenters, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* masons \w that|strong="H3588"\w* wrought \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*,

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* repairs: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* cut stones, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* buy \w timber|strong="H6086"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* stones, \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* hewed, \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* repairs \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w might|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* completely finished, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* wheresoever \w there|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* need \w of|strong="H1004"\w* expenses \w to|strong="H5921"\w* uphold \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w But|strong="H2388"\w* \w there|strong="H3068"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* not \w made|strong="H2388"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w same|strong="H0853"\w* money \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w temple|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, bowls, \w or|strong="H1004"\w* fleshhooks, \w or|strong="H1004"\w* censers, \w or|strong="H1004"\w* trumpets, \w or|strong="H1004"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* vessel \w of|strong="H1004"\w* gold \w and|strong="H3068"\w* silver, \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* money \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w temple|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w For|strong="H1004"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* given \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w them|strong="H0935"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* work, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w temple|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w might|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* repaired.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* reckoned \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w men|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w received|strong="H2388"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* money \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w distribute|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w workmen|strong="H4399"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w bestowed|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* faithfully.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* trespass, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* sins, \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w brought|strong="H5414"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* temple \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w priests|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* Hazael king \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Syria \w went|strong="H0935"\w* \w up|strong="H0935"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* fought \w against|strong="H0935"\w* Geth, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w took|strong="H1961"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w set|strong="H0935"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* face \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w go|strong="H0935"\w* \w up|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* Jerusalem.

Wherefore Joas \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Juda \w took|strong="H3920"\w* \w all|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* sanctified things, which Josaphat, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* Joram, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* Ochozias \w his|strong="H5921"\w* fathers \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Juda \w had|strong="H4428"\w* dedicated \w to|strong="H5921"\w* holy uses, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* which \w he|strong="H0227"\w* \w himself|strong="H6440"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w offered|strong="H5927"\w*: \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w all|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* silver \w that|strong="H5927"\w* could \w be|strong="H4428"\w* found \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* treasures \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* temple \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Lord, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* palace: \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w sent|strong="H5927"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w Hazael|strong="H2371"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w he|strong="H0227"\w* \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w off|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* rest \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* acts \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Joas, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w did|strong="H0834"\w*, \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* not written \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* book \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* words \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* days \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Juda?

\w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* servants arose, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* conspired \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w themselves|strong="H1992"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* slew Joas \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* house \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Mello \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* descent \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Sella.

\w For|strong="H1004"\w* Josachar \w the|strong="H0853"\w* son \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Semaath, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* Jozabad \w the|strong="H0853"\w* son \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Somer \w his|strong="H5221"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w struck|strong="H5221"\w* \w him|strong="H5221"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* died: \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w they|strong="H5221"\w* buried \w him|strong="H5221"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H5221"\w* fathers \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* city \w of|strong="H1004"\w* David, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* Amasias \w his|strong="H5221"\w* son reigned \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H5221"\w* stead.
